title: KUSW Trendibly Thermal Gloves, Warm Touchscreen Winter Gloves, Waterproof Windproof Outdoor Touchscreen Gloves for Hiking, Cycling
features: Thick Thermal Material----Made of upgraded high-quality nylon and fleece material, with three layers of insulating fabric winter gloves to keep your hands warm enough to protect your hands from cold weather.

High Sensitivity Touch Screen----These thermal bicycle gloves conveniently feature close fit and touchscreen sensitive fingertips. Meaning that you can take calls and manage your smart devices without having to remove your warm gloves.

Waterproof and Windproof----Waterproof windproof thermal gloves for outdoor sports. Using the latest waterproof and windproof materials, it works well even in the rain or when cycling in the mountains. Stay warm and comfortable.

Adjustable Size and Non Slip Design----On the back of the Gloves has a zipper, so you can adjust the sizes to fit your hands comfortably. And with anti-slip silicone design on the palm ensures you a secure holding the handlebars better even in the hard road.

Multipurpose Gloves and Gifts----Suitable for cycling running golfing driving climbing hiking and outdoor sports in all seasons, and other outdoor adventures. It is also the best gift for lovers, friends and family etc.
